title: 2001 German Grand Prix
summary: The 2001 German Grand Prix (formally the Grosser Mobil 1 Preis von Deutschland 2001)[4] was a Formula One motor race held on 29 July 2001 at the Hockenheimring, Baden-WÃ¼rttemberg, Germany. It was the 12th round of the 2001 Formula One World Championship and the 63rd German Grand Prix. Williams driver Ralf Schumacher won the 45-lap race starting from second. Rubens Barrichello finished second for Ferrari with BAR driver Jacques Villeneuve third scoring his last F1 podium finish.
